QuestData.Title: Aradne
QuestData.Description: Our last hope of victory lies in defeating the val'kyr. You've done well up until now... but you're only one $g man: woman; and there are literally dozens of them raining destruction on the battlefield.$b$bOne enormous val'kyr sits atop the tower to our south... you can see her from here. Perhaps if we eliminate her, the remaining val'kyr will dissipate.$b$bThis is our only hope. Bring some of Grant's men with you. You'll need their protection for this battle.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: She leads the val'kyr in Andorhal. This is our only hope...
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Aradne atop the tower in western Andorhal.
QuestData.RewardText: I watched your victory from below. Well-fought, but ultimately, it was for naught.$b$bThe val'kyr and the Forsaken press on; soon, they will overtake us. We have lost Andorhal.
